Articles.Content:
I'm a bit confused about what happened to the new part highlighting, but it seems it is actually partially implemented.

As seen in that picture, the new part highlighting is infact ingame. It only seems to work when mousing over the staging icons though. Is this intended?

Edited December 22, 2014 by mike9606
That's probably a bug - it should be active every time you hover over an object - just like it does when a vessel is launched.
Working as intended. It's designed to make stage organisation easier.
thing is, I don't even get that when I do stage things....

thing is, I don't even get that when I do stage things....

You need to turn on antialiasing before it will work, it's mainly for use in the VAB/SPH to help you locate your stages when you hover over the stage icons.

This did the same thing prior to 0.90

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/50143-0-23-5-Editor-Part-Highlighter
I was under the impression that it would replace all stock glow. Seams it's only for staging.
